languages.text: Соломон Антар остался в рядах Адептус Арбитес, все больше отступая от буквы закона в пользу его духа. Спустя несколько лет Соломон отказался забирать десятину с одного из окраинных миров и тем самым обрекать людей на голодную смерть. Зная о давнем знакомстве проктора с Вольным Торговцем, маршал не рискнул казнить вольнодумца, но отправил того на невыполнимую миссию, которая и стала смертным приговором Соломону.
languages.translation_comment: Соломон схизматик не стал маршалом, арбитров не разогнали
Соломон схизматик не стал маршалом, арбитров не разогнали

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, straying ever more from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. On one occasion, several years later, he refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, as this would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the Proctor's long-standing ties with the Rogue Trader, the Marshal decided not to take the risk of having the freethinker executed. Instead, he sent Solomorne on an impossible mission, thereby spelling his death sentence.
languages.original_text: Соломон Антар остался в рядах Адептус Арбитес, все больше отступая от буквы закона в пользу его духа. Спустя несколько лет Соломон отказался забирать десятину с одного из окраинных миров и тем самым обрекать людей на голодную смерть. Зная о давнем знакомстве проктора с Вольным Торговцем, маршал не рискнул казнить вольнодумца, но отправил того на невыполнимую миссию, которая и стала смертным приговором Соломону.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, ever more often straying from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. Several years later, Solomorne refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, which would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the proctor's longstanding ties with the Rogue Trader, the marshal did not take the risk of having the freethinker executed, but instead sent him on an impossible mission that spelt a death sentence for Solomorne.

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar blieb in den Rängen der Adeptus Arbites, wich aber mehr und mehr von den Buchstaben des Gesetzes ab – zugunsten seiner Intention. Einige Jahre später weigerte er sich einmal, den Zehnt von einer der Randwelten einzutreiben, weil das den Tod der Bevölkerung durch Verhungern bedeutet hätte. Da der Marschall von der langen Verbindung des Proktors mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} wusste, ging er das Risiko, den Freidenker hinrichten zu lassen, lieber nicht ein. Stattdessen schickte er Solomorne auf eine unmögliche Mission und sprach damit sein Todesurteil.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, straying ever more from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. On one occasion, several years later, he refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, as this would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the Proctor's long-standing ties with the Rogue Trader, the Marshal decided not to take the risk of having the freethinker executed. Instead, he sent Solomorne on an impossible mission, thereby spelling his death sentence.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne Anthar blieb in den Rängen der Adeptus Arbites, wich aber mehr und mehr von den Buchstaben des Gesetzes ab – zugunsten seiner Intention. Einige Jahre später weigerte er sich einmal, den Zehnt von einer der Randwelten einzutreiben, weil das den Tod der Bevölkerung durch Verhungern bedeutet hätte. Da der Marschall von der langen Verbindung des Proktors mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} wusste, ging er das Risiko, den Freidenker hinrichten zu lassen, lieber nicht ein. Stattdessen schickte er Solomorne auf eine unmögliche Mission und sprach damit sein Todesurteil.

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar demeura à l'Adeptus Arbites, s'éloignant chaque jour un peu plus du texte des lois au profit de son esprit. Des années plus tard, voyant qu'il aurait condamné tout un peuple à mourir de faim s'il avait prélevé la dîme sur un monde des confins de l'Imperium, il refusa d'accomplir son devoir. Conscient des liens du proctor avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, le maréchal préféra ne pas prendre le risque de le faire exécuter, mais l'envoya à la place accomplir une mission impossible, signant par là même son arrêt de mort.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, straying ever more from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. On one occasion, several years later, he refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, as this would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the Proctor's long-standing ties with the Rogue Trader, the Marshal decided not to take the risk of having the freethinker executed. Instead, he sent Solomorne on an impossible mission, thereby spelling his death sentence.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne Anthar demeura à l'Adeptus Arbites, s'éloignant chaque jour un peu plus du texte des lois au profit de son esprit. Des années plus tard, voyant qu'il aurait condamné tout un peuple à mourir de faim s'il avait prélevé la dîme sur un monde des confins de l'Imperium, il refusa d'accomplir son devoir. Conscient des liens du proctor avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, le maréchal préféra ne pas prendre le risque de le faire exécuter, mais l'envoya à la place accomplir une mission impossible, signant par là même son arrêt de mort.

languages.text: 索罗蒙·安萨依旧在法务部中任职，但却越来越不愿遵守法律条款，而是倾向于恪守律法本身的精神。几年后，他拒绝向某个边缘世界征收什一税，因为这会导致那个世界的人民在饥荒中丧命。新任元帅意识到了行商浪人对索罗蒙造成的长期影响，但没有亲自动手处决这位自由思想的追随者。相反，他派遣索罗蒙执行一项根本不可能完成的任务，借此宣判了索罗蒙的死刑。
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, straying ever more from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. On one occasion, several years later, he refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, as this would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the Proctor's long-standing ties with the Rogue Trader, the Marshal decided not to take the risk of having the freethinker executed. Instead, he sent Solomorne on an impossible mission, thereby spelling his death sentence.

traits.locale_text: 索罗蒙·安萨依旧在法务部中任职，但却越来越不愿遵守法律条款，而是倾向于恪守律法本身的精神。几年后，他拒绝向某个边缘世界征收什一税，因为这会导致那个世界的人民在饥荒中丧命。新任元帅意识到了行商浪人对索罗蒙造成的长期影响，但没有亲自动手处决这位自由思想的追随者。相反，他派遣索罗蒙执行一项根本不可能完成的任务，借此宣判了索罗蒙的死刑。

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar permaneció en las filas del Adeptus Arbites, alejándose cada vez más de la literalidad de la ley para adherirse a su espíritu. En una ocasión, varios años después, se negó a recoger el diezmo de uno de los mundos periféricos, pues hacerlo habría condenado a su gente a la muerte por inanición. Consciente de la larga relación del Procurador con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, el Mariscal prefirió no arriesgarse a ejecutar al librepensador. En su lugar, envió a Solomorne a una misión imposible, condenándolo así a muerte.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, straying ever more from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. On one occasion, several years later, he refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, as this would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the Proctor's long-standing ties with the Rogue Trader, the Marshal decided not to take the risk of having the freethinker executed. Instead, he sent Solomorne on an impossible mission, thereby spelling his death sentence.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne Anthar permaneció en las filas del Adeptus Arbites, alejándose cada vez más de la literalidad de la ley para adherirse a su espíritu. En una ocasión, varios años después, se negó a recoger el diezmo de uno de los mundos periféricos, pues hacerlo habría condenado a su gente a la muerte por inanición. Consciente de la larga relación del Procurador con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, el Mariscal prefirió no arriesgarse a ejecutar al librepensador. En su lugar, envió a Solomorne a una misión imposible, condenándolo así a muerte.

languages.text: ソロモーン・アンサールは高等裁定局の一員としてその職に留まり続けたが、次第に法の文面よりもその精神を重視するようになっていった。数年後のある出来事では、辺境惑星のひとつから租税を徴収することを拒否した。徴収すれば、その惑星の民を餓死に追いやることになると分かっていたからである。この代理人がローグトレーダーと長年の関係を持っていることを知っていた将帥は、自由思想家である彼を処刑するという危険な選択は避けた。その代わり、ソロモーンを決して達成できない任務へと送り出し、事実上の死刑宣告を下したのだった。
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, straying ever more from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. On one occasion, several years later, he refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, as this would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the Proctor's long-standing ties with the Rogue Trader, the Marshal decided not to take the risk of having the freethinker executed. Instead, he sent Solomorne on an impossible mission, thereby spelling his death sentence.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーン・アンサールは高等裁定局の一員としてその職に留まり続けたが、次第に法の文面よりもその精神を重視するようになっていった。数年後のある出来事では、辺境惑星のひとつから租税を徴収することを拒否した。徴収すれば、その惑星の民を餓死に追いやることになると分かっていたからである。この代理人がローグトレーダーと長年の関係を持っていることを知っていた将帥は、自由思想家である彼を処刑するという危険な選択は避けた。その代わり、ソロモーンを決して達成できない任務へと送り出し、事実上の死刑宣告を下したのだった。

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar, Adeptus Arbites saflarında kaldı. Kanunun ruhu adına, kanunun sözünden daha fazla saptı. Birkaç yıl sonra bir gün, ilgili dünya halkı açlıktan ölme tehlikesiyle karşı karşıya kalacağından uç dünyalardan birinden aşar toplamayı reddetti. Üsteğmen ile Hür Tacir arasında uzun süredir devam eden bağların farkında olan Miralay, özgür düşüneni infaz etme riskine girmemeye karar verdi. Bunun yerine Solomorne'u gerçekleştirilmesi imkânsız bir göreve göndererek onu ölüme mahkûm etti.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar remained in the ranks of the Adeptus Arbites, straying ever more from the letter of the law in favour of its spirit. On one occasion, several years later, he refused to collect tithe from one of the fringe worlds, as this would have condemned its people to death by starvation. Aware of the Proctor's long-standing ties with the Rogue Trader, the Marshal decided not to take the risk of having the freethinker executed. Instead, he sent Solomorne on an impossible mission, thereby spelling his death sentence.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne Anthar, Adeptus Arbites saflarında kaldı. Kanunun ruhu adına, kanunun sözünden daha fazla saptı. Birkaç yıl sonra bir gün uç dünyalardan birinden aşar toplamayı reddetti çünkü aksi takdirde dünya halkı açlıktan ölme tehlikesiyle karşı karşıya kalacaktı. Üsteğmen ile Hür Tacir arasında uzun süredir devam eden bağların farkında olan Miralay, özgür düşüneni infaz etme riskine girmemeye karar verdi. Bunun yerine, Solomorne'u gerçekleştirilmesi imkânsız bir göreve göndererek onu ölüme mahkûm etti.
